resources.string: or directly input the ID of word to start from.

string-array.name: words
string-array.item: success noun 成功 ps_pu_pk_ps_a_pe_ps I_have_given_up_all_hope_of_*.
advertise verb 宣伝する a_pae_pd_pv_pte_pvarr_pt_a2_pai_pz
investigate verb 調査する pi_pn_pv_a_pe_ps_pt_pte_pg_pei_pt
abandon verb 見捨てる/諦める pte_pb_a_pae_pn_pd_pte_pn I_had_to_*_all_my_money.
tolerate verb 耐える/我慢する pt_a_po_pl_pte_pr_pei_pt *
observe verb を観察する pte_pb_pz_a_pte_l_pvarr_pv
adopt verb を採用する pte_pd_a_po_pp_pt He_finally_got_the_boss_to_*_his_plan.
accomplish verb (仕事など)をやり遂げる pte_pk_a_po_pm_pp_pl_pi_psh Despite_his_physical_handicap,_he_*ed_many_things_in_his_life.
fulfill verb (義務・約束)を果たす pf_pu_pl_pf_a_pi_pl SHe_*ed_her_dream_of_becoming_a_dancer.
attain verb (目標)を達成する pte_pt_a_pei_pn He_*ed
